item.description: Engine Response; INC#0613; 09:38AM; 15230 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tBe3QJ; Sylmar; A high tension power pole snapped at the base (presumed due to high winds) and is leaning towards a one story strip mall (there is no contact with the structure at this time). The strip mall is being precautionarily evacuated. LA DWP notified to handle the downed pole. Traffic will be affected at the intersection of Roxford St and Glenoaks Blvd for an undetermined period of time - all drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. There are no injuries reported.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E298 E98 T98; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0227; 05:55AM; 17534 W Lanark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3THa1RD; Lake Balboa; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 39 minutes with no injuries reported. Dept of Water and Power were notified regarding downed power lines. One adult female was displaced and Red Cross is responding to provide immediate assistance as necessary. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E103 E273 E287 E290 E73 E90 EM15 RA100 RA73 RA87 RA90 T73 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0227; 05:16AM; 17545 W Lorne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EBTfPt; Lake Balboa; A large, outside fire extended into the attic of a one story single family dwelling. There is an additional residence being exposed. This is a wind driven fire and there are downed power lines behind one of the homes. A search of the primary home has found no occupants and no injuries reported. Firefighters are making good progress (offensive mode).; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E103 E273 E287 E290 E73 E90 EM15 RA100 RA73 RA87 RA90 T73 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1820; 11:41PM; 1127 E 29th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UH3Iig; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 70 firefighters extinguished the fire in 70 minutes with no injuries reported. There was heavy smoke inside and smoldering fire in the rolled carpets which took an extended period of time to locate and fully extinguish. No further details. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E17 E203 E209 E210 E215 E221 E3 E46 EA1 EM1 RA14 RA21 RA246 RA803 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T9 UR3; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1820; 10:31PM; 1127 E 29th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UH3Iig; Central-Alameda; A one story commercial company, approximately 150â€™ x 100 (carpet company) with an outside fire that extended into the building. Additional resources were requested and firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E17 E203 E209 E210 E215 E221 E3 E46 EA1 EM1 RA14 RA21 RA246 RA803 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T9 UR3; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1673; 08:41PM; 1446 W 66th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gaiUWa; Harvard Park; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in the detached garage in 16 minutes, preventing extension to the exposed structure. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E57 E66 RA33 T33; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1673; 08:25PM; 1429 W 67th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Opf08F; Harvard Park; One story, detached garage with fire showing and exposing another structure. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E57 E66 RA33 T33; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1429; 05:52PM; 414 S Oxford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OcoRON; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E226 E229 E261 E52 RA6 RA826 T26 T29 T61; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1429; 05:36PM; 441 S Oxford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AiwyNO; Koreatown; Two story, craftsman-style single family dwelling (vacant) with heavy fire showing. The fire appears to be in the 2nd story/attic. Firefighters are in offensive mode (interior fire attack only, no vertical ventilation required).; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E226 E229 E52 RA6 T26 T29; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Assisting Agency; INC#1277; 04:14PM; 12965 Little Tujunga Canyon,Rd In Laco; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ObQg3f; Lake View Terrace; LAFD responded to the shooting range area on Little Tujunga with Angeles National Forest (ANF) @angeles_NF and @LACoFDPIO to approximately 1 acre mulch pile burning in low wind with a slow rate of spread in the Federal Response Area (FRA). All LAFD Air Operations resources are being released in addition to some LAFD ground resources. This is an ANF incident and all questions are referred to their agency. No further updates will be provided.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BP74 CM40 CM42 DZ11 DZ12 E24 E274 E275 E289 E290 E298 E75 E77 E89 EM14 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 HE2 RA90 T74 T75 T89 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
